t: Confidence-gated Critique Loop with hard cap
built: Multi-round critique protocol with confidence scoring (cf) and round tracking (rd) in yolo-critic.md
critique-loop.sh script with --phase-dir/--config/--role flags, confidence gating, hard cap of 3 rounds
critique.jsonl schema extended with cf and rd fields in artifact-formats.md
critique config object in defaults.json (max_rounds:3, confidence_threshold:85, enabled:true)
